name: Tappy Cat - Rhythm Collector
description:
Help support us by sharing Tappy Cat with friends! We'll add more songs and cats with more downloads!

"4.5/5 - One of the best rhythm games I played" - TouchArcade

Cats are cute, but can they play music too?
Play the thumb and paw friendly tree guitar by tapping inside music bubbles before they fly away. Earn fish as you build up perfect streaks. Lure stray cats to appear by mastering their favorite songs and give them lots of fish. Can you find them all?

How to play?
Pop and/or hold inside each bubble before it leaves. Don't tap outside the bubble or its game over!

Games features:

• Unlock many varieties of adorable playable cats
• Simple but challenging bi-directional game mechanic inspired from cats (read: temporary cross-eye may occur)
• Sweet chill songs custom arranged from beloved classical composers

Contact support@inspirlabs.com for issues, bugs, suggestions!
